# Government Tender Announcement

## Title 
Simultaneous Thermal Analyzer (TGA/DSC)

## Reference Number
cb-895-51198004

## Tender Details
- **Publication Date**: November 18, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
- **Tender Status**: Open
- **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services

## Project Overview
The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a Simultaneous Thermal Analyzer (TGA/DSC) instrument for the Clean Energy Innovation (CEI) Mississauga branch. The instrument will be used to expand the advanced materials characterization laboratory, enhancing the characterization of materials relevant to CO2 capture and energy storage applications.

## Key Requirements
- The instrument must be capable of high-throughput experimentation and unattended operation.
- The software should provide real-time data access through external software interfaces, allowing users to access data via Python scripts.
- The instrument should be capable of analyzing thermogravimetric analysis (TGA) and differential scanning calorimetry (DSC) in custom gaseous atmospheres.

## Regions of Opportunity
The tender is open to suppliers located in Quebec (excluding National Capital Region) and Ontario.

## Procurement Method
The procurement method is competitive, open bidding.

## Contracting Details
- **Contracting Entity**: National Research Council of Canada
- **Contact Information**:
  - Name: Kacendra Dion
  - Email: [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
  - Phone: 438-324-8125
  - Address: 2620 Speakman Dr., Mississauga, ON L5K 2L1, Canada

## Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP), are available on the Government of Canada's Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
